page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN BETHERSDEN
page.content: IT IS AN AREA WITH A VARIETY OF EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES.IN THE AREA SURVEYED THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 300 JOBS,50% IN AGRICULTURE.OF THESE, 160 ARE BASED IN AND AROUND THE MAIN AREA OF SETTLEMENT. THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHO WORK LOCALLY IS ROUGHLY EQUAL TO THOSE WHO TRAVEL TO LONDON AND THE NEARBY TOWNS TO THEIR WORK.WITHIN THE AREA THE MAIN EMPLOYMENT GROUPS ARE AGRICULTURE,METAL GOODS,TIMBER PROCESSING,BUILDING,DISTRIBUTIVE TRADES AND PROFESSIONAL,SCIENTIFIC AND EDUCATIONAL SERVICES.LOCAL SHOPS, PUBLIC HOUSES AND HOTELS HAVE PART TIME WORK AVAILABLE FOR WOMEN AND TEENAGE CHILDREN.THERE ARE A NUMBER OF SELF-EMPLOYED PEOPLE INCLUDING A FARRIER,CARVERS OF HIGH-QUALITY ROCKING HORSES,ARCHITECTS,FENCING ERECTORS,ETC..
